sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO md_migr_weakdep ( id , connection_id_fk , schema_id_fk , parent_id , child_name , parent_type , child_type , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by ) VALUES ( #id# , #connectionIdFk# , #schemaIdFk# , #parentId# , #childName# , #parentType# , #childType# , #securityGroupId# , #createdOn# , #createdBy# , #lastUpdatedOn# , #lastUpdatedBy# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE md_migr_weakdep SET id = #id# , connection_id_fk = #connectionIdFk# , schema_id_fk = #schemaIdFk# , parent_id = #parentId# , child_name = #childName# , parent_type = #parentType# , child_type = #childType# , security_group_id = #securityGroupId# , created_on = #createdOn# , created_by = #createdBy# , last_updated_on = #lastUpdatedOn# , last_updated_by = #lastUpdatedBy# WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM md_migr_weakdep WHERE 1 = 1 AND id = #id#
sqlMap.select: SELECT id , connection_id_fk , schema_id_fk , parent_id , child_name , parent_type , child_type , security_group_id , created_on , created_by , last_updated_on , last_updated_by FROM MD_MIGR_WEAKDEP WHERE id = #id#

SELECT A.ID , A.CONNECTION_ID_FK , A.SCHEMA_ID_FK , A.PARENT_ID , A.CHILD_NAME , A.PARENT_TYPE , A.CHILD_TYPE , A.SECURITY_GROUP_ID , A.CREATED_ON , A.CREATED_BY , A.LAST_UPDATED_ON , A.LAST_UPDATED_BY FROM ( SELECT ID , CONNECTION_ID_FK , SCHEMA_ID_FK , PARENT_ID , CHILD_NAME , PARENT_TYPE , CHILD_TYPE , SECURITY_GROUP_ID , CREATED_ON , CREATED_BY , LAST_UPDATED_ON , LAST_UPDATED_BY , ROWNUM FROM MD_MIGR_WEAKDEP WHERE 1=1
ID = #searchKeyword#
CONNECTION_ID_FK LIKE '%' || #searchKeyword# || '%'
ORDER BY ID DESC ) A WHERE ROWNUM BETWEEN #firstIndex# AND #recordCountPerPage#
